Introduction: Oh my, aren't you a cutie! Welcome to the valley, dear.$6#$b#It's so exciting when someone new moves in!$1#$e#Have you met my son, Victor?$3
divorced: You got what you wanted, so leave me alone.$5
secondChance_Girls: ...Revive things, @?$6#$b#Sweetie...I've worked hard to get past what you did to me. Marriage is...even more important to me than to most people. You know that.$2#$b#...I'm willing to try again, but this is the last time.$3#$b#I do love you, sweetie. I hope I'm not making a mistake trusting you again.$2
dumped_Girls: Do you really have the audacity to be talking to me right now, @?$5#$b#I need some time after the way you treated me. And a drink.$2
breakUp: I knew this was a bad idea from the start.$2#$b#Thank you for being up front about your feelings.$0#$e#...$2
stardrop_gift: @. I put a special order in for this Stardrop fruit for you.$4#$b#It's as fresh as they come. I hope you enjoy it, sweetie. May it make your work a little easier.$3
give_flowersA: ...You want to be with me? Really?$1#$b#Of course I want to be with you too. I just didn't think...Thank you. For taking the first step.$3
give_flowersB: Sweetie, I'm touched. Of course I'd love to.$1#$e#...Please be patient with me, though. It's been a while since I was involved with anyone.$3
give_pendant: ...$2#$b#@...I never thought that I would get married again. I never even thought I'd be with anyone again at all.$2#$b#But spending time with you...it's made me feel things that I thought I had left behind a long time ago.$3#$b#Yes, @. I would love to marry you. And...this new chapter we're starting, I hope it's the happiest of all.$1
rejectNPCB: That's not going to happen.$6#$e#The conversation is done, @.$2
reject_two_heartA: I don't feel that way about you, dear. I'm sorry.$2
reject_two_heartB: We need to know each other a little better before we take that step, sweetie.$6#$e#I'm not opposed, but...I'm not ready to make that choice.$2
reject_four_heartA: The thought of dating someone again...I just don't think I can, sweetie.$2#$e#We can talk about it more another time.$2
reject_four_heartB: @, you're a great friend, but...$2#$b#I just need a little more time, sweetie. Let's get to know each other a little better.$2
engageA: Do you think I'm stupid, dear? I know you're engaged to someone else.$5#$e#Don't toy with me like that. It's unkind.$2
engageB: ...@. What would your partner think?$2#$e#I'm disappointed in you, sweetie.$5
marriedA: Really, @? You're already married.$5#$e#I'm just going to pretend this never happened. I suggest you do the same.$5
marriedB: @...what are you doing? I'm not going to come between you and your spouse.$6#$e#Do you really think I'm the kind of person who would do that?$5
refusal_knownA: Oh, honey, marriage is a big conversation for us to have.$6#$e#Let's have a glass of wine and talk about it sometime.$0
refusal_knownB: I'm really not thinking about getting married again anytime soon, @.$6#$b#Maybe someday I'll be ready for that again.$2
refusal_no_heartsA: Oh! I've heard that those pendants are a local romantic custom around here. How sweet.$6#$b#Are you planning to give it to someone?$1
refusal_no_heartsB: It's not funny to joke around about that, sweetie. Marriage means a lot to me.$2
spring_Thu: Working a corporate job in the city was a different chapter of my life.$3#$q 8001/8002 joja_followup#You used to work for Joja, isn't that right?#$r 8001 50 joja_yes#Yes, I used to work there.#$r 8002 -50 joja_no#No. I never worked at Joja.
joja_yes: Hmm, that's what I thought. Mayor Lewis told me.$6#$b#Office job to farmer - what an incredible career change! I work as a stock trader in my free time, maybe 15 hours a week.$1#$b#You must feel so much freer to not be tied up in a corporate office, and able to do the work you love.$3#$b#I'm happy you found your passion, sweetie.$1
joja_no: That's strange. That isn't what Morris told me...$6
joja_followup: $p 8001#It was for you too, sweetie. I'm happy we were both able to move on.$3|It was for you too, sweetie. I'm happy we were both able to move on.$3
JenkinsHouse_20_9: %Olivia is concentrating on her yoga form.
JenkinsHouse8_18_5: I'm in bed, dear. Come back another time.$0
SeedShop_21_20: %Olivia is concentrating on her yoga form.
spring_1: I'm happy it's spring again. I was growing very weary of the winter weather.$1
spring_9: Sometimes I miss how busy I used to be back in Zuzu City at my corporate job.$2#$e#I have so much free time here in the valley. It allows me to focus on my hobbies, but sometimes I can get lost in my thoughts...$3
spring_12: The Egg Festival is tomorrow! A good excuse to indulge in some vintage wine from my collection.$3
spring_23: Hi, honey. Spring is coming to an end soon. Do you know what crops you'll plant for summer?$3#$e#Marnie plants melons every year, and they're always delicious. I look forward to them.$1
spring_28: I think I may plant sunflowers in our backyard. When I see sunflowers, I feel like I'm really in the spirit of summer.$1#$e#Sunflower seeds make a healthy snack too!$3
Mon: I wonder if any of Victor's friends want a part-time job cleaning the house. It'd save me a lot of time.$6
Mon2: My schedule is quite busy, but I make sure to fit in time with Caroline and Jodi on Mondays and Thursdays. They're both close friends of mine.$3#$e#I try my best to stay away from Pam. She just doesn't sit well with me.$6#$e#Why? Dear, that's none of your business.$1
Mon4: I'm debating whether I should hire a landscaper. The backyard could use some attention.$0#$e#You want to talk more? I'm busy at the moment, dear.$6
Mon8: It's a joy to see you, @.$3#$e#Ciao!$1
Mon10: Hello, honey. Would you care to do yoga with me tomorrow at the acrobatics class?$3#$e#I can teach you some basic poses!$1
Tue: Hello, dear. Having a productive day today? Don't overwork and hurt yourself.$3#$e#I wouldn't want you moving away so soon.$6
Tue2: I've been practicing yoga for years. I can do advanced poses such as 'Lord of the Dance' and 'Lotus'.$1#$e#Staying healthy is important if you want a beautiful, flawless body like mine.$6
Tue8: Yoga is a physical, mental, and spiritual practice! Whenever you have some spare time, I'd love to teach you some poses.$3
Wed: Hi, sweetie. Happy Wednesday.$3#$e#Maybe if you're lucky, I'll give you a taste of some rare wine.$1
Wed4: I watered the plants in the house today. Healthy plants mean clean, fresh air in the house.$1#$e#It's not something money can buy.$3
Wed10: I fetched a bottle of wine from the cellar for you. It's a wonderful vintage.[348]$1
Thu: Sorry, dear. I'm too busy to talk right now.$0#$e#That means you can leave, @.$6
Thu2: Hi, @! I'm in cheerful and lovely mood today!$1#$e#Why? Because I made a lot of money this morning through a stock trade.$0
Thu6: Will you be at the saloon tomorrow, @? You may see me there. Victor goes every Friday to hang out with his friends.$3
Thu8: It's a joy to see you. How are you?$3#$e#Ooh, I see! Staying productive as always.$1
Fri2: Some of my stocks decreased in value this morning. I lost 30,000G.$2#$e#%Olivia isn't in a good mood to talk.
Fri6: I always indulge myself with a nice glass of wine on Fridays.$3#$b#Gus carries some rare vintages, and is always stocked with wine from Blue Moon Vineyard.$1
Fri10: Happy Friday, my love! You've been working so hard lately! You deserve a day off.$3#$e#Let me know if I can get you anything.$4
Sat: There's always too much work to be done around the house. I may hire a butler soon.$5#$e#Have a nice day, dear.$6
Sat2: I picked up painting as a hobby several years ago. Leah has given me some great pointers!$3#$e#She's truly a doll, wouldn't you say?$1
Sat6: Hi, honey. How is this Saturday treating you? You work too hard during the weekends.$3#$e#You should take a break every once in a while.$0
Sat10: I've been making so much progress on my art lately. I'm proud of myself.$1#$e#Have a wonderful day, my love!$3
Sun: You don't take days off, do you? I certainly don't want to distract you from your work.$6#$e#Go on ahead with your errands, @.$0
Sun2: Time is money! You know this is true, @. I always check my stocks every day.$3#$e#Of course, you know this. It's the reason you never take a day off from working on your farm.$6
Sun6: I got lucky this morning trading and had a huge payout.$1#$b#I believe I'll spend it on a painting from my favorite trendy artist from the Fern Islands.$0
Sun10: It's so wonderful to see you! How is your day?$1#$e#*smooch* Did I make your day better?$3
summer_1: Ah! Summer! I can finally show off my new bikini at the beach.$3#$e#I believe Caroline has a new bikini as well.$6
summer_5: My seamstress in Chestervale designed a beautiful dress for me.$1#$b#I'm looking forward to wearing it at the next town festival.$3#$e#Don't forget to compliment me when you see it, sweetie.$1
summer_10: The governor doesn't visit Stardew Valley often. It's an honor he's visiting us tomorrow.$1#$e#I expect you'll be on your best behavior and contribute to the soup.$3
summer_17: I donated 15,000G to a charity in Zuzu City yesterday.$1#$b#I understand not everyone is as fortunate as I am. I try to help where I can.$2#$b#You look surprised. I do care about more than just my own good fortune, sweetie.$0
summer_22: Hi, honey. Here's a little spending money. Go buy yourself some ice cream!$1[336]
summer_28: Will you be joining everyone to watch the moonlight jellies tonight, @?$3
summer_3_1: That was a horrible blast last night. Did that wake you up too, @?$0#$e#It sounded like an avalanche. I need to talk to Mayor Lewis.$2
summer_Mon: Hello, dear. How's your Monday? Is the week off to a good start?$3#$e#Oh. Me? It's going well. Thank you for asking.$6#$e#Has anyone ever told you that you're very polite?$1
summer_Mon4: Susan gave me a freshly picked melon from her field today. She's an absolute sweetheart!$1#$b#Her crops are much healthier than Andy's.$6#$e#I don't think I'd ever eat any of his produce.$2#$e#That seems a little harsh? Oh, honey, I'm just trying to watch out for my health. But I know that you want to make everyone feel at home.$0
summer_Mon8: Hi, sweetie. You're working so hard to start off the week, and in this summer heat too.$3
summer_Mon10: I'm using a new sunscreen. It's doing wonders for my complexion.$3#$b#Let me know if you want try it.$1
summer_Tue: I'm part of the aerobics class at Pierre's. Yoga is an excellent way to focus the mind and body.$3#$e#It also keeps me healthy and slim.$1
summer_Tue4: I picked up fresh produce from Pierre this morning. He has the best organic selection.$3
summer_Tue6: Mayor Lewis was 5,000G over budget for the Egg Festival this year.$2#$b#I contributed my own money to ensure we could still host the festival.$0#$e#In return, he allowed me to use more community kegs next to the community center.$3#$e#We should all try to give back to the community when we can. Together, we're what makes this town special, dear.$3
summer_Tue8: Next time I get back from the Fern Islands, I'll bring some ringfruit for you.$1#$e#They're delicious, and make the perfect desserts. Pies, cakes, custards... anything you can think of!$3#$b#I always like giving gifts, but I especially love making sure you get a nice treat sometimes, sweetie.$1
summer_Wed: Sophia's latest batch of iridium-quality wine was superb. I must let her know.$2
summer_Wed4: I invested 30,000G in a startup company this morning. I have faith they're going to grow big!$1#$e#Tech companies are booming in Zuzu City.$3#$b#If you want to make easy money, now's the time to get into stocks, @.$1
summer_Wed6: If you ever want me to invest your money in stocks, I'll be happy to oblige, @.$1#$e#I do, however, take a 20 percent cut from any profits for consulting.$6
summer_Wed8: I may take a trip to Grampleton soon. The most divine weather you'll ever experience is under the shade of the tall redwood trees.$3#$e#Maybe we can take a trip there together sometime, honey.$1
summer_Thu: Hello, dear. What do you think of my new earrings?$3#$b#I ordered these in the mail from Sautine City!$1
summer_Thu8: Caroline, Jodi and I may go swimming sometime soon. Caroline has a new swimsuit she wants to debut.$3#$b#You want to tag along? Of course, sweetie. You're always welcome.$1
summer_Thu10: Caroline and I are swimming at the beach soon.$3#$b#Would you care to join us, sweetie?$4
summer_Fri: I've been spending more time painting lately.$1#$e#There's so much to learn. So many different styles and techniques... it's a little overwhelming.$0
summer_Fri2: Andy made me feel uncomfortable at the saloon last night. He was staring at me constantly.$2#$e#I heard he's horrible at paying his tab. That's not too surprising.$6
summer_Fri6: Yoga is a great activity if you have high blood pressure or high cholesterol.$1#$e#I think Andy could use some yoga. Or at least a healthier diet.$6#$b#..I know I've spoken harshly of him before, but I worry about him. Ready-made Joja meals aren't a healthy choice.$2
summer_Fri10: My, my. Your outfit is absolutely flawless today.$1#$e#If you need any tailoring done, I know someone in Chestervale who can assist!$3
summer_Sat: I received a hefty amount of junk mail this morning. I need to have a word with Mayor Lewis.$2#$e#Most of the mail I get are advertisements and scams.$5
summer_Sat2: I saw Linus foraging in town last night during a late-night stroll.$2#$b#I felt bad so I offered him 3,000G and he turned it down.$2#$e#He looks... strangely familiar. I don't know why.$6#$e#...I should talk to Mayor Lewis about whether I can help him find a home.$2
summer_Sat4: Mayor Lewis listened to a number of my suggestions to improve the town. He's really a very good mayor.$3#$e#I love how much this place is beginning to feel like home, sweetie. Is it starting to feel that way for you, too?$3
summer_Sat8: Leah taught me several brushstroke techniques. I envy her artistic skills.$3#$e#If I apply myself more, maybe I'll be able to paint a portrait of you one day!$1
summer_Sun: I'm going to try a different yoga routine next Tuesday. Something to challenge myself!$3
summer_Sun4: Jodi told me Vincent isn't doing well in math. She has so much to worry about...$2#$e#I may ask Victor if he can tutor him. If not, I suppose I do have a knack for math from trading...$3
summer_Sun8: My other hobbies? Well...since we're friends...don't tell anyone, but...$0#$e#I'm in the middle of a romance novel. I read more literary novels too, but these are my favorite guilty pleasure.$4#$e#Have a wonderful day, dear.$9
fall_1: Good luck on your fall harvest this year, @. If you sell any pumpkins to Pierre, I may pick some up!$3
fall_9: I'm visiting Blue Moon Vineyard tomorrow to order more wine from Sophia.$3#$b#I sometimes have Victor go, but I want to see the Gem Sea from the cliff. It's a beautiful view.$1#$e#I'd like to go with you sometime... will you join me there?$3
fall_15: You're participating in the fair tomorrow, sweetie? I wish you the best of luck!$1#$e#Caroline says Pierre's crops have been doing very well this year. It'll be a close call between you two.$6
fall_17: At the fair yesterday, I spoke with a tourist that came all the way from Pine-Mesa City!$1#$b#It's not as big as Zuzu City, but it's still bustling with activity and commerce.$3
fall_22: Despite the fact I was an accounting manager at Joja, I never shop at their stores, and never will.$0#$e#Their products aren't healthy, and they'd damage my complexion.$6
fall_27: Spirit's Eve is tomorrow, @! Will you be exploring the maze this year?$1#$e#Victor has a tendency to get lost in the maze. He always seems to get caught in rough situations.$6
fall_28: There's a dark story about the family that used to live in our house.$2#$e#I'm not allowed to talk to anyone about it.$6#$e#Yes, @. That includes you too.$6#$e#...$2#$e#%Olivia is now ignoring you.
fall_Mon: During fall, I may sometimes take trips in the forest to gather some mushrooms.$0#$b#I wish Victor enjoyed mushrooms as much as I did. I'd use them in just about every dish.$6
fall_Mon4: I saw %pet walking around town yesterday. Such an adorable animal!$1#$e#%pet reminds me of Dewey... Victor loved that cat so much.$2#$e#Has he told you about Dewey yet? ...Losing that cat broke his heart, poor thing.$2
fall_Mon8: You're working so hard, sweetie! This energy tonic from Doctor Harvey will help you get your energy back.[349]$3#$e#Have a wonderful day!$1
fall_Tue: Mayor Lewis is considering funding some dock repairs. The wood is quite old.$0
fall_Tue2: The beauty of yoga is the enhanced flexibility it gives you, @.$3#$b#Working the fields on your farm will certainly keep your muscles toned too.$1
fall_Tue6: I tried to get Victor to do yoga with me and he refused to even try it.$6#$e#I suppose I'll just stick to Tuesdays. Emily loves our yoga days.$3
fall_Tue10: %farm Farm must have an exceptionally astonishing landscape this time of year.$3#$e#Perhaps I could paint your farmhouse...?$4
fall_Tue8: I've been doing yoga for many years. It's helped tone my body and concentrate my mind to a balanced state.$3#$e#You should join us sometime, @.$1
fall_Wed: I prefer red wine over whites. Reds have more minerals and vitamins, and the taste is much more complex.$3#$e#Sophia specializes in dry red wines. The weather in the valley is perfect for it.$1
fall_Wed4: Pierre makes spiced cider during fall. He doesn't sell it at the front counter.$3#$e#He only sells it to his closest friends. Luckily, Caroline and I have an excellent relationship.$1#$e#Next time, I'll pick a little extra up for you.$3
fall_Wed8: Caroline and Jodi are my best friends. We've been through so much together.$1#$e#The three of us are mothers. We see eye to eye on many things, and rely on each other for support.$3
fall_Thu: Jodi baked me an apple pie yesterday. It was delicious! I need to make her something special too.$1
fall_Thu4: I'm attending the silent auction in Zuzu City today. It happens weekly during the spring.$0#$b#I'm always on the lookout for more Gotoran china. It's quite exquisite.$1
fall_Thu8: Jodi's been stressed lately. I'm going to offer to watch Vincent for a day so she can take a break.$0#$e#Let me know if I can ever help you relax a little, @. I know you work hard.$3
Fall_Fri: Fall is just the most marvelous season for fashion, don't you think, @?$3#$b#Dresses, jackets, layers...so many possibilities. I love it!$3
fall_Fri6: Do you ever go shopping to expand your wardrobe, sweetie?$0#$b#I know a few places where you can get quality clothes at a great bargain, if you ever want to go together.$3
fall_Sat: Marlon walked into the saloon with the wizard last night and they both went to the back room.$6#$b#A person wearing a brown cloak joined them, but their face was covered.$0#$e#I wonder what on earth was going on back there...$6
fall_Sat6: Such a chilly fall day. Want to join me in the saloon later for a little pick-me-up, sweetie?$3
fall_Sat10: I went foraging for fresh mushrooms and cooked what I found. I saved some for you, dear![205]$4#$e#I wish Victor enjoyed mushrooms as much as I do.$6
fall_Sun: It's such a shame all Gotoro Empire imports are banned. They produce exquisite art and wine.$2#$e#I hope this war with them ends soon. So much violence over such trivial differences...$2
fall_Sun6: Hi, sweetie. Is this Sunday treating you well?$1#$e#Always a pleasure, dear.$3
winter_1: My, my. That snow storm last night blanketed the entire valley.$6#$e#Keep yourself warm, sweetie. I wouldn't want you catching a cold!$3
winter_7: Hello, honey. Are you walking with all of us to the ice fishing spot tomorrow?$3#$e#I'd love to see you compete against Willy.$1
winter_13: I broke one of my Gotoran dishes this morning. Now I need to spend 6,000G to replace it. They're getting even harder to find.$2#$b#It's important that we treasure the things that remind us of where we come from, don't you think?$0
winter_21: Caroline had an argument with Pierre today and vented to me about it afterward.$2#$e#I hope their marriage is okay.$2#$b#They're both strong people. I know they'll get through this.$0#$b#...I should check in on her. I wonder if she's talked to Jodi yet...$0
winter_24: Hi, @! Are you keeping yourself warm this winter? The Feast of the Winter Star is tomorrow.$3#$e#I got the perfect gift. For who? It's a secret, dear!$1
winter_28: Spring is almost here, @! I need to hurry up and decide on what plants I'm going to plant in our backyard this year.$1#$e#Have a wonderful day, dear. Good luck with your farming in this coming season.$3
winter_Mon: I almost slipped on some ice today.$6#$b#Be careful when you're walking outside, dear.$2
winter_Mon4: Do you shop at Joja, @?$0#$b#It's not that I'll judge you if you do, sweetie. I just know that they cut a lot of corners and the quality of their product suffers.$2
winter_Mon8: You're one of my favorite people to talk with, @.$1#$b#You always have a wonderful story to tell.$6#$e#Can you tell me about the mines again?$3
winter_Mon10: My, my. Quite the chilly day.$0#$b#Perhaps we could settle on the couch with a nice cup of hot chocolate? I have a lovely mix I order from Grampleton.$1
winter_Tue: Today has been extraordinarily busy. I've earned a glass of a good wine tonight.$6#$e#Yes? Can I help you?$0
winter_Tue2: My mother and father are visiting soon. Everything has to be perfect!$0#$e#...Maybe you'll meet them someday, sweetie. Then you'll understand.$6
winter_Tue8: I bought some potted plants from Marnie. They're doing wonderful in the kitchen.$1#$e#I'd get some chickens from her too, but I wouldn't have anywhere to put them.$0
winter_Tue10: You know, I could perhaps give you some private yoga lessons if you're interested.$4
winter_Wed: Robin built our fireplace. She's an exceptional carpenter, and can build just about anything.$1
winter_Wed4: Caroline and Jodi don't drink at the saloon very often. Those two are always so busy.$2#$e#I enjoy our chats, sweetie. Let's talk again soon. And maybe you can join me at the saloon sometime.$1
winter_Wed8: Winter in Pelican Town is beautiful. All of the colorful decorations alongside the bright white snow makes every day feel so festive.$3#$e#Gus, Pierre, and Mayor Lewis do a wonderful and tasteful job with their decorating.$1#$e#This is such a wonderful place to make a home, isn't it, @? I'm glad you settled here too.$3
winter_Thu: I've been trying to get Jodi and Caroline to come to the bathhouse with me.$1#$e#It'd be such a wonderful lady's night. Making sure to take time to recover is important.$6
winter_Thu6: It's great to take a break from working on %farm Farm during winter, isn't it, @?$3#$e#I know you enjoy your work, but it's important to take breaks to care for yourself.$0
winter_Thu10: Don't tell Caroline or Jodi, but I'm contemplating retiring from stock trading.$3#$e#I'd like to spend more time on my hobbies, friends, and with you, of course.$1
winter_Fri: I special order my painting supplies from the Fern Islands.$3#$b#They're expensive, but it's important to have high-quality tools.$6
winter_Fri8: I finally managed to order a vintage that's in high demand from a vineyard just north of Grampleton. They gave me an extra bottle!$3#$e#I want you to have it, dear. Everyone should get to enjoy nice things once in a while, especially you.[348]$1
winter_Sat: Although I retired young, I still dabble in stocks.$0#$e#I'm adept at making quick money from trading.$6
winter_Sat4: I purchase all of my jewelry from Sautine City. Their jewelers are unrivaled in their craftsmanship and attention to detail.$0#$e#I'll make sure to show you the next piece I order.$6
winter_Sat8: It's a joy to see you, @.$3#$e#Ciao!$1
winter_Sun: I feel as if I'm starting to get sick. This winter has been unusually cold.$2#$e#I need to pay a visit to Harvey. We're fortunate to have an experienced doctor in the valley.$0
winter_Sun4: Sometimes I worry that during my time at Joja, I did more harm to the world than good.$2#$b#Over time, Joja has been pushing unhealthy foods, making decisions that are damaging the environment...it's irresponsible. That's part of the reason I left.$0#$b#I'm glad the path my life took led to us becoming friends.$1
winter_Sun8: Are you all right, @? You look a little pale.$6#$e#...Make sure you're taking good care of your health, sweetie. You might want to check in with Harvey.$6#$e#I wouldn't want anything to happen to you.$2
